articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.title: SpaceCraft is aiming for the gap between Starfield, Satisfactory and Eve Online - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Wartales, Northgard and Dune developers Shiro Games are making a space exploration sim with a bit of everything, but how exactly will it stand apart?
articles.content: I'll be blunt: the only thing that really entices me about SpaceCraft is that it's from Shiro Games, creators of such robust RPG and strategy fare as Dune: Spice Wars, Evoland, Northgard and Wartales… [+8811 chars]
